00017 Reciver::~Reciver() {
00018 
00019         MT_LOGDEBUG(m_systemId << ": reciever destructor!!!")
00020         stop();
00021 }
00022 
00023 Reciver::Reciver(Queue<Data*>* q, Inspector* i) {
00024         MT_LOGINIT(Reciver)
00025         sock = NULL;
00026         m_queue = q;
00027         inspector = i;
00028         m_systemId = inspector->getSystemId();
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 void Reciver::stop() {
00033         MT_LOGDEBUG(m_systemId << ": stop")
00034         notifyInspector = false;
00035         Deactivate();
00036         sock->Close();
00037         InfiniteThread::stop();
00038 
00039 }
00040 
00041 void Reciver::SetSocket(TCPSocket* s) {
00042         sock = s;
00043         Activate();
00044 }
00045 
00046 std::string Reciver::SendSubmitResp(Smpp::SubmitSm* pdu) {
00047 
00048         time_t t;
00049         t = time(&t);
00050         char buf[255];
00051         Smpp::SubmitSmResp resp;
00052         resp.sequence_number(pdu->sequence_number(), false);
00053         snprintf(buf, 255, "m.smpp_%u%u", (unsigned int) t, pdu->sequence_number());
00054         resp.message_id(buf);
00055         SendPdu((Smpp::Header*) &resp);
00056         return std::string(buf);
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 int Reciver::SendDeliverResp(Smpp::DeliverSm* pdu) {
00061 
00062         char buf[255];
00063         Smpp::DeliverSmResp resp;
00064         resp.sequence_number(pdu->sequence_number(), false);
00065         snprintf(buf, 255, "m.smpp_%u", pdu->sequence_number());
00066         resp.message_id(buf);
00067         return SendPdu((Smpp::Header*) &resp);
00068 }
00069 
00070 int Reciver::SendEnqLinkResp(Smpp::EnquireLink* pdu) {
00071 
00072         Smpp::EnquireLinkResp resp;
00073         resp.sequence_number(pdu->sequence_number(), false);
00074         return SendPdu(sock, (Smpp::Header*) &resp);
00075 
00076 }

00078 
00079 void Reciver::runLoop() {
00080 
00081         Data *data;
00082         bool needProcessing = false;
00083         if (IsActive()) {
00084                 Smpp::Header *hdr = RecvPdu();
00085 
00086                 if (hdr != NULL) {
00087                         data = new Data(hdr, false);
00088                         data->systemId = m_systemId;
00089 
00090                         switch (hdr->command_id()) {
00091 
00092                         case 0x00000004:
00093                                 data->msgId = SendSubmitResp(((Smpp::SubmitSm*) hdr));
00094                                 needProcessing = true;
00095                                 break;
00096                         case 0x80000004:
00097                                 needProcessing = true;
00098                                 break;
00099 
00100                         case 0x00000005:
00101                                 needProcessing = true;
00102                                 SendDeliverResp(((Smpp::DeliverSm*) hdr));
00103                                 break;
00104                         case 0x80000005:
00105                                 break;
00106 
00107                         case 0x00000015:
00108                                 SendEnqLinkResp((Smpp::EnquireLink*) hdr);
00109                                 break;
00110                         case 0x80000015:
00111                                 break;
00112                         default:
00113                                 MT_LOGERROR("unknown cmd (" << hdr->command_id() << ")")
00114                                 Deactivate();
00115                         }
00116 
00117                         if (needProcessing) {
00118                                 MT_LOGTRACE(m_systemId << ": send to processor")
00119                                 m_queue->push(data);
00120                         } else {
00121                                 delete data;
00122                         }
00123 
00124                 } else {
00125                         MT_LOGERROR(m_systemId << ": recvPdu return error")
00126                         Deactivate();
00127 
00128                 }
00129         } else {
00130 
00131                 MT_LOGWARNING(m_systemId << ": reciever is inactive. break")
00132                 if( notifyInspector )
00133                         inspector->NetworkError(this);
00134         }
00135 
00136 }
00137 
00138 }
00139 }
